PROJECTS

Static Site Generator

Write a post (in markdown) and push it to github. Github actions will get triggered, it will this static site generator and generate the required html/css/image files etc, create a .tgz archive and then upload this to the AWS machine where it will be picked up by the nginx web server. Python
